## 1. Multinomial logit model:

Kenneth Train’s exercises using the mlogit package for R

№5, page 5

```{r}
library("mlogit")
library('apollo')
```
```{r}
data("Heating", package = "mlogit")
df <- mlogit.data(Heating, shape = "wide", choice = "depvar", varying = c(3:12))
```
```{r}
summary(df)
```
